swiftsolutions.taskscheduler.branchandbound

Class BNBAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • swiftsolutions.taskscheduler.branchandbound.BNBAlgorithm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Algorithm

    public class BNBAlgorithm
extends java.lang.Object
implements Algorithm
    Class that executes the Branch and bound algorithm, used to test pruning techniques and used for milestone 1.
